name: Luxury Rentals Miami Beach
tag_list: setai, hotels, miami-setai, miami, hotel, luxury-hotels
overview:
Luxury Rentals Miami Beach is a leading service provider in the hospitality industry.

LRMB offers accomodations in most famous luxury hotels, resorts and privately owned properties around the globe.

Among LRMB most exclusive hotel residences are:

  • The Setai â€“ most renowned oceanfront resort in the center of Miami Beach
  • The Gansevoort South - beachfront exquisite hotel condo and spa located in Miami Beach
  • The Mondrain â€“ fashionable hotel condominium situated on West Avenue Miami Beach
  • The Murano Grande â€“ exclusive condominum complex in the South of Fifth Street District of South Beach
  • The Continuum â€“ one of the most stylish and luxurios complexes in Miami Beach

LRMB provides hotel reservations for discounted rates. You can make your booking online for a room/apartment/suite/condo in all properties which are on offer. LRMB is a perfect choice for special events, luxury vacations, honeymoons, weddings, etc.

LRMB has on board a seasoned and highly qualified team of professional hoteliers. They acquired their experience and expert skills while working for years at the most famous and exquisite hotels and properties around the globe.

LRMB offers an exclusive global concierge service to their clientele to cater to all their needs and desires, assure maximum comfort and satisfaction. Visit Concierge Partner, Phantom Select to learn more.
